mitar 12kata noadu withiyakata yabadawa adala bhumi bhagaya thibu awasthawaka wuwa da adhi usa godanangili idikirimakata nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya awasara denu labanne awata pradeshayata sapaya athi pahasukamwalata badhawak ho pradeshaye anukulathawata haniyak ho eki godanagilla nisa sidunowana bawata; godanagilla nisa rathawahana gamanagamanaya pilibanda prashna ho dushkaratha athi nowana bawata; jala sampadanaya, kasala apawahanaya saha widuli balaya sapayima sandaha ginnen saha saha anekuth wipathwalin aarakshawa salasima saha rathawahana nawatha thabima sandahath pramanawath wada piliwelak yediya haki bawata; yana karunu sambandhayen nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya sahimakata path wanne nam bawata nagarika sanwardhana adhikariye anka 392/9 darana 1986.03.10 dinathi athi wishesha gasat pathrayema thawa duratath sadahanwe.
